sent.orig: Good! The second line of my couplet is: Floating-clouds appear,often appear,often appear and often go.
sent.trans: 琳：好句。我的下联是“漂浮的云出项了，经常出现，经常出现，又经常消失。”

sent.orig: How often have you heard these conversations? How often do we get stuck in traffic jams?
sent.trans: 这样的对话你听过多少次？我们有多少次遇到塞车？

sent.orig: Occidental don't often entertain guests; but Chinese often invite friend to dinner.
sent.trans: 西方人不常款待客人，而中国人却经常邀请朋友吃饭。

sent.orig: Hearings are often very detailed; members of Congress often question closely those officials who spend money.
sent.trans: 听证会通常涉及许多细节问题，国会议员对那些主管花钱的官员往往会盘根问底。

sent.orig: Disease often goes with poverty/Disease and poverty often go together.
sent.trans: 疾病与贫穷常相伴而生。
